properties.description: This is a data flow example of how to load facts into your fact table from a single sample Employee dimension. There is also an example of handling early-arriving facts.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmployeeID as string,
		Hours as string,
		Amount as string,
		ProjDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Facts
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployee
Facts derive(employeeID = toInteger(EmployeeID),
		iscurrent = 1,
		facttimestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttributes
SetAttributes, DimEmployee lookup(SetAttributes@employeeID == EmpID
	&& SetAttributes@iscurrent == DimEmployee@iscurrent,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimEmployee
CheckForEarlyFact aggregate(groupBy(ProjDate,
		CheckForEarlyFact@employeeID),
	TotalHours = sum(toInteger(Hours)),
		TotalAmount = sum(toInteger(Amount))) ~> DailyAggs
LookupDimEmployee select(mapColumn(
		employeeID = SetAttributes@employeeID,
		Hours,
		Amount,
		ProjDate,
		facttimestamp,
		EmpID,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent = DimEmployee@iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> OrigData
DailyAggs, OrigData join(DailyAggs@ProjDate == OrigData@ProjDate
	&& DailyAggs@employeeID == OrigData@employeeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAllColumns
LookupDimEmployee derive(employeeID = iif(isNull(SetAttributes@employeeID),0,SetAttributes@employeeID)) ~> CheckForEarlyFact
JoinAllColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProjDate as string,
		employeeID as integer,
		totalHours as integer,
		TotalAmount as integer,
		FactTimeStamp as timestamp,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		ProcessTime as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProjDate = OrigData@ProjDate,
		employeeID = OrigData@employeeID,
		totalHours = TotalHours,
		TotalAmount,
		FactTimeStamp = facttimestamp,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		ProcessTime = processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> writeFactTable
